import React from 'react' import { Col, Form, Row, Tab, Tabs, FloatingLabel } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Formik } from 'formik'; import * as yup from "yup" import FileUpload from '../FileUpload' const schema = yup.object().shape({ firstName: yup.string().required(), lastName: yup.string().required(), username: yup.string().required(), city: yup.string().required(), state: yup.string().required(), zip: yup.string().required(), terms: yup.bool().required().oneOf([true], 'Terms must be accepted'), }); const AddProjectTabs = () => { return (
Project Name

Client Name Project Code Team Lead Project Manager
Team Members: 0 {" "} {/*Team Members: {props.team/lenth}*/}
Timesheet Approval Type Expense Approval Type
Project Description Duration (Hours) Project Estimated Cost Project Status Project Code
Start Date Due Date Project Template
{/* */} {/* https://www.primefaces.org/primereact/showcase/#/fileupload */}
) } export default AddProjectTabs
